statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-4 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 1 , -5 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 3 \, x - 2 , 13 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x , x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 2 , -5 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 3 \, x - 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
